    User Page: Andy ONeill - TechNet Articles - United States (English) - TechNet Wiki

    Andy is a long term Contractor with a wide variety of experience.  He works in the Microsoft stack  (mostly) on a wide variety of applications using all sorts of technologies - web, desktop, mobile, services, reporting and database. Front end through middle tier and back end.
